content: {"locationId": "2373", "organizationId": "1978", "name": "Beardstown Food Pantry", "address1": "121 E 2nd Street", "address2": "", "city": "Beardstown", "state": "IL", "zipCode": "62618", "country": null, "phone": "217-473-8351", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "40.017831", "longitude": "-90.4336936", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "The Beardstown food pantry is an opportunity. to shop freely just as you would in any grocery store. we also have a nice waiting area to sit and if we have a big crowd it does not take long at our panty we have it set up so people can move though the pantry pretty quickly.", "notes": "when you arrive at the pantry you will form a line beside the building starting around 12:30 no need to come early we don't run out of food you will be given a number upon entry of the side door. we thank everyone for being on their best behavior while we are serving all of our customers. we are all volunteers doing our very best to help you.", "contactName": "joe Engelbrecht", "contactPhone": "121-747-3835", "contactEmail": "joeengelbrecht77@gmail.com", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 22, "regionName": "Central Illinois Foodbank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "c7ac99f6-662f-41d7-9feb-616facef2e6f.png", "website": "https://www.centralilfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["Sunday 1:00 PM-3:00 PM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
